dmca.title: [ABUSE] DMCA Notice
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Thursday, August 11, 2005 11:18 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] DMCA Notice]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] DMCA Notice
Date: Thu, 11 Aug 2005 09:42:39 -0500
From: Aaron Goldblatt <copyright@abbywinters.com>
To: abuse@theplanet.com


This complaint is sent pursuant to applicable provisions of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998.

Under penalty of purjury I certify that:

1)  I am authorized to make this complaint on behalf of the copyright owner.

2)  The copyrighted work in question is adult photography of a model shot by
Abbywinters Pty Ltd. Any other photographs on your servers of the woman,
women, or couples in the listed URLs at the bottom of this notice are also
covered by this complaint.

3) The copyrighted work in question is available on Internet servers within
the IP address block of your Internet provider, as registered by the
American Registry of Internet Numbers (ARIN, http://www.arin.net/).

4) For purposes of this complaint, you may contact me, Aaron Goldblatt, at
copyright@abbywinters.com.  I may be contacted by United States postal mail
at 609 Pineview Lane, Fort Worth Texas, 76140.  I may be contacted by voice
telephone at 817-683-0273.  Email is the preferred method of communication.

5) I believe in good faith that the use of the material outlined in this
complaint is not authorized by Abbywinters Pty Ltd. (the copyright owner),
abbywinters.com (the site originally publishing these photographs), its
agents, or the law.

6) I believe that the information in this notification is accurate.
I certify that I am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive
right that is being infringed.

This document is signed electronically by Aaron Goldblatt.

Thank you,


Aaron Goldblatt

http://www.teens-mania.com/cjthumbs/5007.jpg
http://www.teens-mania.com/cjthumbs/7289.jpg
http://www.teens-mania.com/cjthumbs/4776.jpg
70.85.113.155
abuse@theplanet.com



- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFC+3oavK/XpJs6oyURAqx+AJ9wNlRr2Gu63iutlrpxQ46jVdmdrgCfdCpt
